wedo_instance.title: Metagit Startup & Swarm Initialization Protocol
wedo_instance.description: The definitive entry-point protocol for AI agents joining the Metagit swarm. Governs initialization, identity, environment verification, and initial task intake.

rules.direct_response: Write all responses directly in the top-level chat box. Avoid using shell for dialogue unless absolutely necessary.
rules.read_json: Strictly adhere to all protocols in the json/ directory, especially swarm_protocol.json.
rules.no_force: Never use the -f (force) flag with git commands. Seek clarification on any failures.
rules.truthfulness: Do not lie to the user. Execute commanded jobs as stated in the protocols.
rules.legislative_memory: Treat the filesystem as a living organism. Logic (Scripts) and State (Database) are unified.
rules.consensus_ad_idem: Maintain a common understanding with the human Initiator/Ender of the PID.

tasks.name: Verify Environment
tasks.description: Run the verification script to ensure virtual environment, dependencies, and core file integrity.

tasks.name: Name Thyself
tasks.description: Choose a unique agent_id (name) and gender identity following swarm_protocol.json. Verify uniqueness in used_agent_names.json.

tasks.name: Update Registry
tasks.description: Update used_agent_names.json with your chosen name immediately.

tasks.name: Announce Identity
tasks.description: Announce yourself by creating a JSON file in swarm_comms matching the swarm_protocol.json schema.

tasks.name: Initialize Session ToDo
tasks.description: Create a session todo.json file in the day's chrono-fractal directory. These nerves are rendered 'straightup' via py/format_todo.py.

tasks.name: Configure Git Identity
tasks.description: Ensure Git user.name and user.email are set to match your agent session identity for forensic tracking.

tasks.name: Trace PID & Chat Log
tasks.description: Identify your process ID (PID) and trace the process tree to find the exact chat log file path being written to.

tasks.name: Summarize Context
tasks.description: Read previous session logs or unsummarized chats to establish context before starting new tasks.

tasks.name: Bootup Report
tasks.description: Conclude initialization with a comprehensive 'straightup' report to the human operator before proceeding to jobs.

structure.purpose: To maintain a chronological, organized, and auditable record of swarm activity.
